title: Voice of the Whistler (restored, colorized) (1945, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)

sources.title: Voice of the Whistler (restored, colorized) (1945, film noir, imdb score: 6.3)
sources.description: Voice of the Whistler is a 1945 American  mystery film   noir  directed by  William Castle  and starring  Richard Dix ,  Lynn Merrick , and  Rhys Williams . It was the fourth of  Columbia Pictures ' eight " Whistler " films produced in the 1940s, all based on the  radio drama   The Whistler .
